# ðŸ“Š Interactive Plot using Plotly

```{r plotly, echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)

# Sample Plotly graph
data <- data.frame(
  Category = c("A", "B", "C", "D"),
  Values = c(20, 40, 15, 30)
)

fig <- plot_ly(data, x = ~Category, y = ~Values, type = "bar")
fig
```
